# Public Request for Proposal (RFP) Announcement

## Reference Number and Solicitation Number

Reference Number: SSC-23-00022013:T  
Solicitation Number: BPM018314/22013

## Tender Status and Cancellation

This request for proposal (RFP) is expired. The tender closing date was March 24, 2023. 

## GSN Classification

* GSN Classification: 5164CT - Lightning Rod Contractors
* GSN Description: Entrepreneurs en paratonnerres

## Procurement Details

* Notice Type: Request for Proposal 
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Canada

## Trade Agreements

This opportunity is covered by the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA).

## Contracting Entity

* Shared Services Canada
* Address: 90 Metcalfe Street
* City: Ottawa
* Province: Ontario
* Postal Code: K0A 0C3
* Country: Canada

## Tender Description

The public RFP with attachments - Amendment 001 is expired.
